channel.title: How to change a ip address?
channel.description: I have a source and I cant find the ip address in the client if someone can tell me exactly what to look for I would greatly appreciate it.

item.title: How to change a ip address?
item.dc:creator: @wesely wesely
item.description:
@wesely wrote:

I have downloaded a source that already has a ip implemented into it and I am looking to change it because it logs me into there ip every time I try and log on. and i cant find out where to change the ip address that is why i posted here.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change a ip address?

item.title: How to change a ip address?
item.dc:creator: @maxxy2 maxxy2
item.description:
@maxxy2 wrote:

Well as long as your running the server, on YOUR computer, you should be able to log onto to it via localhost without editing anything. The IP Address is what other members use to connect to your server. You donâ€™t need to change anything if i understand correctly. Have you tried to log on with localhost yet?
